reviewText: I'm Very disopointed in this movie I have had it replaced and still can't get it to play in my C.D. player the pictures and sound are distrorted it gets rainbow like colors in it when it is in black and white and locked my C.D. player so I'm asking for a refund on it all of my other movies play just fine but not this one. But I'm very happy with all the other movies I have got from Amazon.
